items.content_html: üè† A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.

items.content_html: Form Ninja is a lightweight, fast, and flexible JavaScript library for efficient form validation. It supports custom rules, error handling, and various input types like checkboxes, radio buttons, and file uploads. Designed for quick integration, it simplifies form validation with minimal configuration.
items.title: Roshan190/form-ninja: Form Ninja is a lightweight, fast, and flexible JavaScript library for efficient form validation. It supports custom rules, error handling, and various input types like checkboxes, radio buttons, and file uploads. Designed for quick integration, it simplifies form validation with minimal configuration.
